Name: LIFE (Love in the Future Ecstasy)
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE mint in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. DRIZZLE tea liqueur over drink.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 1999 by Nick Strangeway at Ché, London, England, for Martin Sexton (writer and artistic entrepreneur).
